Passaic.Meadowlands Hospital Medical Center:
The Meadowlands Hospital Medical Center (MHMC), a for-profit hospital, is located at 55 Meadowlands Parkway in Secaucus, New Jersey.


== History ==
Established in 1976 as a non-profit, it was purchased in December 2010 while near bankruptcy by MHA LLC, owned and operated by Richard Lipsky (a former anesthesiologist), Tamara Dunaev, Pavel Pogodin, and Anastasia Burlyuk.
On December 19, 2017 the state approved the sale of the hospital to Yan Moshe for $12.2 million.
